msbt.message: Now there's a sight for bad eyes. ! How you doin'?Been up to anything crazy? I hope so, just as long you took care of yourself as you did it.You only get one body, kiddo. Don't wreck it!
Ah! ! Been a spell since I seen your goofy mug. You ain't changed a bit!
It's ! I ain't spoken to you in a while, it seems. I was worried I done scared you off.Well, I know you got your own affairs to attend to, so I'll let you get to it. Good to see you!
! Where you been? I ain't talked to you in my word, how long HAS it been?Well, glad to know we're still neighborly! Stop by again soon, alright?
Hey there, ! Been a spell and a half since we spoke, I reckon!That weren't on purposewere it? Even an old cuss like me's not made of stone. Anyway, good to see you!
! It's been too long!You know you don't need some cockamamie reason to come talk to old , right?Well, I'm just glad you stopped by. Take care, now!
